document.full_text: former boxing champion sugar ray leonard has said that he was sexually abused as a teenager by a "prominent" olympic coach, according to a report in the new york times on tuesday.
document.title: sugar ray leonard book says coach sexually abused him-nyt
lines_and_colors: former boxing champion sugar ray leonard has said that he was sexually abused as a teenager by a "prominent" olympic coach, according to a report in the new york times on tuesday.
